column1: Local Foods////Came to check this place out for lunch today and we loved it! It's got a great vibe that is perfect for groups or couples. It's a casual environment
column2: you order food at the counter
column4: and the food is brought out to you. They have tons of food options
column7: and green. Great spot for all food preferences including vegan and vegetarian. The summer harvest salad was amazing!! The flavors and texture work so well together
column8: I'll definitely be back for it. We also got the portobello melt sandwich
column10: all of which were delicious. We topped it off with the chocolate chip pecan cookie which was awesome. The quantity was great for the price
column11: we came in hungry and still had some leftovers we took home. All in all
